website_summaries.verdict: Easy installation and added features make this a great choice for those seeking a solid deal on a satellite radio.
pros: Stores up to 10 of your favorite channels for one-touch use
Can lock or unlock channels for parental control
Allows access to Sirius-only exclusive content
cons: Instruction manual did not arrive with all models, and some compatibility issues depending on subscription chosen

customer_reviews.title: Entry Level System. Small Buttons
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty good but after a few weeks it kept telling me to check the antenna connection and finally stopped working all together. If I had to do all over again I would get a bigger one as this is pretty small as are the buttons. It was very easy to install. Just not for me
customer_reviews.author: M. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get everything started and put together
customer_reviews.text: This is the Sirius for vehicles. Came with all the pieces included for us to mount in the car. It is designed to plug into an auxilliary port or to play over an FM channel which was helpful. Easy to get everything started and put together, directions and on line chat support made the whole process from opening the box to listening to music less the 30 minutes. Pretty good size and ease of use is good even. For my husband's big bulky hands. We will have to purchase more accesories like perhaps a plug for a wall or docking speaker as only a car charger is included. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Needed another vehicle kit - buy the whole thing to save money
customer_reviews.text: I have the Stratus 6 and needed another vehicle kit. A standalone kit is almost as expensive as just buying this and selling the radio on ebay. The radio base this is the upgraded universal that supports Stratus 6, 7, and the Onyx line.
customer_reviews.author: Scully

customer_reviews.title: The old roadie I used before only had about 3 fm frequencies to choose from and had better results. I do like all the other added ...
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this to replace an old roadie that I have been using for about 12 years. The reason I am giving it only 3 stars is because I am having problems finding a fm frequency that doesn't bleed over to the satellite signal.The old roadie I used before only had about 3 fm frequencies to choose from and had better results. I do like all the other added bells an whistles and they work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: lee kimmins

customer_reviews.title: inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: You have to use FM stations in your area on the car radio to listen to sirius xm from the Stratus 7. I didn't know that if you drive outside of your zip code, you have to not only know the new zip code that you're in, but you have to research and find the new FM station that is compatible with your new zipcode and then change the FM station on both your car radio and on the satellite radio so they pair up. It's a hassle and inconvenient while driving. It would be nice if it changed it automatically.
customer_reviews.author: NZ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t really work for me. The installation was easy enough, but the set up of getting the actual reception was a little tedious and discouraging. Also, the idea of having dangling cords in side of my car was a big turn off. I eventually just went and head an in-dash unit installed
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My husband had to replace an old Sirius radio that had quit. I had this one for years and liked it so he decided to get the same one. The only issue he had was with the brightness. After researching, he figured out how to adjust it and he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: You won't miss your local channels.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't my 1st Sirius radio, I drove OTR truck driver for 14 years, and I could keep the same channel across the US. You get comedy, politics, religion , news, and any type of music. I use it in 2 different cars, and on a docking station also sold by Sirius radio. Those are great too. It can be plugged in at home, out camping, picnics, even out on the boat too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great radio for any vehicle..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Sirius radio, this works great and comes with everything needed to install in a vehicle, Sirius right now is $30 for a 6 month trial, let it run out and sign back up for a new 6 month trial, $60 for a yrs service, cant beat it..
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Bohannon

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes good
customer_reviews.text: Worked well till I hit Alabama and Mississippi and about half of Lousyana.....JUST doesn't work on I-20.
customer_reviews.author: theoldfred

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install a cinched and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use... small easily placed anywhere you like. I just put mine in the cup holder. It is easy to use. You can adjust the brightness you need to learn a few simple operations and it is so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dorsai

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, easy to setup and to use.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little satellite radio. Easy to use. Easy to setup. Mounted on windshield, and we just draped the wires down to the aux port and power outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: You can't get a better product for the money anywhere. Trust me, I've looked.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my customer's car. They are older folks who don't necessarily do good with electronics. Everything was straight forward and they have been using it without any issues. The packaging describes a 3 month free trial but sirius only honored it for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Poppin Wabbits

customer_reviews.title: ... a built in satellite radio and we are so happy to have this in our main car now
customer_reviews.text: Our second car has a built in satellite radio and we are so happy to have this in our main car now. 100% worth the subscription and cost of radio to enjoy listening to what we want to listen to no matter where we are driving.
customer_reviews.author: RunnerGirlDE

customer_reviews.title: The best siriusxm player for the money
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat this player for price and functionality. The display is clearly visible and lighted at night. The buttons are easy to see and do what you need radio buttons to do! This unit will plug into any car stereo with an auxillary jack in front; Just toss the antennae on the roof, plug it in and listen.
customer_reviews.author: gmoneytanker

customer_reviews.title: Can be used in multiple vehicles
customer_reviews.text: I installed a docking station and antenna on my car and rv. I am able to undock the receiver and move it to which ever vehicle I am using but only have to pay for one subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the free month as stated. Cost 15.00 plus subscription fees to activate.
customer_reviews.author: BigEasy

customer_reviews.title: Nice installation and easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice to be back from OCONUS and using my SiriusXM. The old receiver was obsolete. This new receiver and mount in my car works great. Ordered a 2nd kit to put mount in my wife’s vehicle. Can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Not good in Bloomfield, NJ
customer_reviews.text: 7 miles from NYC, can’t find a good FM channel to stream through... constantly switching channels with no good connection... cancelling after promotional period
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: good unit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice inexpensive unit, no remote control with it, cost almost the same amount
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Satellite radeo, a truck drivers must have
customer_reviews.text: Got a new truck for work that didn't have the satellite radeo built-in so I got this. Excellent... all the cables and mounts you need, I just put the antenna on my dash because it's a huge windshield works great,, no more searching for a station that comes in while driving across country. Price is on point, much much cheaper than in the truck stop.
customer_reviews.author: nicole c.

customer_reviews.title: great little reciever.
customer_reviews.text: This was what I needed since the stereo doesn't have xm, I hooked this up and got the programing, I only listen to tyhree chanels, but not able t[ find any local channels.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement!
customer_reviews.text: Sirius XM says this product “ DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR FREE ANYTHING” ! No free months!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t we order sooner?
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for. We ordered 2 and love them both! We bought this model for the large display. Now the kids can read it from the back seat and we don’t have to always tell them what song or who sings it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz J.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your weatherproofing is removable
customer_reviews.text: Other than the unsightly wires that you deal with on a DIY satellite radio install. This radio is tough and easily controlled with included car kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This radio works well and the package is a good deal. The only thing I didn't like is ...
customer_reviews.text: This radio works well and the package is a good deal. The only thing I didn't like is that this model is not eligible for the ala-carte channel package (Requires Starmate 8) and to get the couple stations I want requires a higher subcription package thats not in the budget / cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: TechieDJ

customer_reviews.title: Awkward mounting. But good sound and flexibility
customer_reviews.text: The unit works great but is a bit awkward to mount properly and cleanly. The power supply is unnecessarily large which complicates mounting possibilities. It sound good and is nice that you can take the radio with you if you want to connect to an external speaker at the pool etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan J Ely

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, would not hold preset stations. Had to pay an activation fee. Then I brought another and had to pay another activation fee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: My previous radio lasted 12 years. Had to replace with new. Bought this one with 3 months free Sirius free. It lasted 3 months and now cant replace due to having received the 3 months free service. Cant buy anything that lasts any more. This was sold threw Amazon not 3rd party. Watch for any specials they give. Your warranty is only good for 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Blackard

customer_reviews.title: Quick & easy installation!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything came for quick & easy installation. We are enjoying it every time we get in our vehicle!! So glad I found it!!
customer_reviews.author: karin roach

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my BF for his birthday for his older truck. He loves it! He likes when we take my car because it has Sirius in it. So I got this for him. Works fine and now he never misses Howard Stern.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Had none of the problems mentioned by other reviewers. Replaced my original Roadie whose power connection port just wore out. Quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Receiver
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Antenna installation requires some skill and patience.
customer_reviews.author: retiredinmaine

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Also
customer_reviews.text: Car Windshield Suction Cup Antenna Mount for Sirius / XM Radio. No need to route the magnetic mount antenna wires through the windshield!
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 of these for all my cars. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for all my cars. I just registered one head unit and move it from car to car. Now I have Howard everywhere I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Radio works great. hooks up easy There a few things you ...
customer_reviews.text: Radio works great. hooks up easy There a few things you need to be aware of. There is a $19.95 per month subscription charge a $3.00 per month royalty charge, and a one time 15.00 set up charge. I got then to waive the set up fee because when I first call they didn't mention it.
customer_reviews.author: photo guy

customer_reviews.title: Long wires but Sirius XM is worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend. It works great. Was easy to install and I set up the radio quickly too. Only downside is the wires, but I just zip tied them together to keep them out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Wisneski

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Constantly loses connection. The push buttons are unresponsive and unreliable. Not a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, small price
customer_reviews.text: This satellite radio unit fits easily into a small space. Wires can be readily hidden and the outside antenna block stays attached to the car body through virtually any weather event or car wash. The station selector buttons are small, but easy to use, and the dsplay is quite legible. The face is removable for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Steve V.

customer_reviews.title: Need it
customer_reviews.text: Use this daily for my commute to work and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk. Just got it and every thirty seconds it says to check my antenna connection so I have to shake the radio and then it works for another thirty seconds. Regret this purchase even though it was only $30.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit the BB2 boombox well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with a BB2 boombox and in order to make it fit I had to remove the stabilizing piece from the boom box and the receiver does not fit in securely and could easily break off. I would not recommend this receiver for the boombox but it might be fine if you will be using it in a car. It also does not display the time as far as I can figure out, but that could be a settings issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry G

customer_reviews.title: Works decently enough. I wish the power cable was ...
customer_reviews.text: Works decently enough. I wish the power cable was a little longer. I added the radio to my account and though I paid a $15 activation fee, it gave me 3 months of free service.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Whole kit cheaper than new pieces sold separately, works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Thac***

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I messed up in not testing this unit within the 30 day return period. When I plugged it in it melted. I tried getting it replaced under the 90 day warranty from Sirius but they don't honor the warranty if you purchase it from someone else like Amazon. It appears I am out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: This radio is not what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon advertises this as a SiriusXM radio but IT IS NOT. It is SIRIUS ONLY. If you want channels available only on XM such as MLB, this radio DOES NOT CARRY THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Wasson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need
customer_reviews.text: I brought this radio to have music during my cross country move. It has proven to be a pretty good investment. I put the antenna on my dashboard, right at the windshield with some putty and haven't had any real problems with reception. Once I got the subscription service, I programmed my stations, and have been good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love music gotta have it. Only problem is my trees get in the way of reception most of the time
customer_reviews.author: scooby doo

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily and it works great. It isn't the best model out there but for what I use it for it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Clark

customer_reviews.title: Easy satellite radio package
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my wife's pickup with the antenna just on the dash. Some controls are less than intuitive but the functions are better than my truck that has Sirius built in.
customer_reviews.author: WI Eng

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like this radio because you can easily move from channel to channel and I like that it displays info.
customer_reviews.author: Fred YZ

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this purchase. At first glance at the radio it looked like a toy; I was doubtful it would work. However, it works great, I installed the antenna in my car, carefully running the wire inside my SUV. The radio can be attached to the air vent in the car, or attach it to your dashboard or window. I recommend this to anyone who doesn't have great local stations in your area.
customer_reviews.author: Stince61

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well. The blue backlighting is awfully bright
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. The blue backlighting is awfully bright. I turned the brightness all the way down. Would prefer a windshield mount, instead of the included vent mount or permanent dashboard mount options.
customer_reviews.author: S. Saint

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but installation is complicated
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but needed a good amount of time to install. I couldn't have done it well by myself, my husband needed to run the wiring from the back of the car all the way to the front where the receiver is plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Quick installation, easy set up, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Simple set up! Only problem was the antenna magnet wouldn’t hold tight enough. I ended up using four microscopic drops of super glue & now it works great! Wasn’t able to figure out how to take advantage of the “free month” however, I’m still satisfied! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, useless.
customer_reviews.text: Simple design, easy to install simcecall you need to do is plug in the wires. However, like others have stated, it was unreliable and would break up constantly. Returned it after first and only road trip with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Inexspive solution
customer_reviews.text: Car radio stopped working for Sirius radio. Instead of a new radio, got this add-on. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schuman

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I use it every day in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I use it every day in my personal truck and work truck. Helps me get through the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No free trial !  Not a new unit
customer_reviews.text: According to the ad, there is a free trial of 3 months included , not getting that. The channel I use to receive the signal, gets distorted by the radio station and I get country music instead of xm radio signal. This unit was already registered to another person, I thought it was new. Please resolve this issue or I want to return it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: The product is just as described, very easy to install and works great!! The signing up for the service and redeeming the 3 months of free service was a nightmare but that is not your fault!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Economical
customer_reviews.text: Good buy for the price if you arent looking for all of the extras.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Bad advertisement / description
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give this any positive rating at all since it is totally not what was advertised. Was having major surgery and recovery when it came. So I missed the return window. Sucks! It’s absolutely no good to me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No free month trial with this radio.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the radio and installed it. When I contacted Sirius for the 3 month free trial, Sirius informed me the radio did not come with the 3 month trial and I would have to contact Amazon and they have to provide the trial.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Can't dim backlight
customer_reviews.text: Cannot dim backlight.. this is a extremely bright blue light when driving at night.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Not a top of the line product for extra features, but works great for its cost. No complaints. I would buy it again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: stanley kuczmiec

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple but does the job. I wanted no frills satellite radio and that's what this is.
customer_reviews.author: Jsnyds

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: gets good reception. A few to many wires hanging off the dash though
customer_reviews.author: Jo Cuz

customer_reviews.title: No signal.
customer_reviews.text: Always loosing signal. They sent me a new one same issue. Save and get one installed. Save yourself a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily as I drive a lot. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rcknfrkapotamus

customer_reviews.title: Love ours
customer_reviews.text: If you have an older vehicles or even base models amd like XM radio this is great
customer_reviews.author: jessie082603

customer_reviews.title: I travel weekly and this receiver has helped to make ...
customer_reviews.text: I travel weekly and this receiver has helped to make those trips more enjoyable. The installation and set-up were quite simple.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D.

customer_reviews.title: I liked the price and the easy installation but was very ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price and the easy installation but was very disappointed that it did not come with the advertised free activation along with one month of service free. That’s false advertisement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing source of entertainment
customer_reviews.text: This product came fast and was very easy to install. My husband had it in my truck in keas than 20 minutes!!! I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Like it a lot but has problems keeping signal. have to unplug it from the mount and take it off mount a couple times a week for it to work like it's supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No radio in it.
customer_reviews.text: Had everything but the xm radio. What’s up with that??
customer_reviews.author: Holly Layne

customer_reviews.title: returning.
customer_reviews.text: thought I was ordering a Sirrus radio. Looks like I bought two car attachments. Will need to return both.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Bought this with a free trail and no activation. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cause it says it comes with a free trail and no activation fee. SiriusXm had no idea what I was talking about. Told me Amazon was supposed to include a gift card. If I could find a link on Amazon to actually talk or chat with someone maybe we could fix this.
customer_reviews.author: jettmary

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. Just need to get a clear unused FM station to play through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was packaged well. The only missing was a the screws to mount the radio in my car. :(
customer_reviews.author: Virginia W.

customer_reviews.title: Just no.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 months then began having issues with antenna. Eventually it quit making contact at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My husband put it in his 02 ranger and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Like Shipped fast, packaged well and installed easily. Dislikes None
customer_reviews.author: Go tribe

customer_reviews.title: SATELLITE AT ITS BEST
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE SECOND ONE I HAVE BOUGHT. IT IS FANTASTIC I LOVE MY XM. I HAVE RECOMMENDED TO A LOT OF MY FRIENDS. HAVE ONE IN ALL MY VEHICLES. THANK YOU. TW
customer_reviews.author: TWDENG1

customer_reviews.title: Wont last too long.
customer_reviews.text: Have replaced this item several times over the last ten years as the plug and/or antenna gets too loose and wont get reception. That being said, I just bought another one. I listen on the computer at home.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: There is ALOT of wire but it should tuck behind the dash and panels well
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to install. A nicer looking mounting system would be nice but, this thing work eo well
customer_reviews.author: Vincent.D.

customer_reviews.title: Sirius radio
customer_reviews.text: This product came with a 3 month trial for Sirius satellite radio but they would not honor that at Sirius. This was false advertising
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H.

customer_reviews.title: Antenna problems.
customer_reviews.text: Does not transmit well, always has static. Needs improved antenna or transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: Tweety65

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cables!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta find the correct transmitter to get audio to car radio.
customer_reviews.author: JackKC

customer_reviews.title: My only issue is I wish the screen brightness could ...
customer_reviews.text: My only issue is I wish the screen brightness could be controlled. Other than that, does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Antennae wire has a short in it somewhere, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Antennae wire has a short in it somewhere, and even going off the Sirius online guide as to which FM channel works in what zip code it still gets quite a bit of static every where I go.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great value as tuners go
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these adaptors and both work well. Great value as tuners go, but wish SiriusXM audio quality was better. In an attempt to cram so many channels into their satellite bandwidth, the music channels suffer from bandwidth starvation and don't come anywhere near digital-CD or even MP3 quality. Again, not a function of this device, but of the satellite radio company, SiriusXM. If you're looking for lots of content variety, SiriusXM is great. If you also expect the audio quality to be good, stick to a music player and save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It works fine. As it replaced the previous radio
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. As it replaced the previous radio, I found that no special adaptation had to be done. I use one radio and have three cars and transfer it from car to car, depending oh vehicle usage.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie

customer_reviews.title: Starmate
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. I had to change my bases to convert from 5.2 volt to 5 volt changing from the Starmate I had but, I will enjoy this one just as much!
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Dutton

customer_reviews.title: how well it works
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to get satellite radio at an affordable price without having to destroy or grossly modify existing equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Satellite Radio
customer_reviews.text: Great Satellite radio for a trucker. Use it all the time and have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Snooks

customer_reviews.title: nothing changed
customer_reviews.text: My old radio just gave out, I purchased a new one which is more compact and didn't need to change any of the wiring to install it.. Works Great
customer_reviews.author: William Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: I been with xmsirius long time but upset I bought radio said 3 months free and xm would not honor
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Photo and description of product misleading at best.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as being able to be used in-home OR in vehicle. Not true - only for vehicle, which we already have. Photo and description of product misleading at best.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Stanley

customer_reviews.title: antenna instructions
customer_reviews.text: I like what I'm hearing. The only problem I have is the installation instruction for the antenna. You don't have to install antenna outside of car. You can place antenna on dashboard and the unit works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: works very good
customer_reviews.text: I like this one way better than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Thorne

product_meta.title: SiriusXM Stratus 7 Satellite Radio with Vehicle Kit | 3 MONTHS ALL ACCESS FREE WITH SUBSCRIPTION
product_meta.description: Style:Single| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingDon't let its intuitive design and easy installation fool you The Stratus 7 brings the world of satellite radio to your ride -or anywhere else you want to listen It may be simple to use but this radio is pure genius
feature_bullets: Sirius Stratus 7 Satellite Radio features an easy-to-read display simple navigation and all the features you need to enjoy SiriusXM in your vehicle
Get access to commercial-free music plus exclusive sports comedy and talk programming (subscription required)
Plan your trip accordingly with One-Touch Jump ️ traffic and weather updates
Save up to 10 presets for fast access to your favourite channels
Blue screen displays artist name song or program title and channel information

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars940 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
